briefdescription.para: Determines whether the layout order of rows is reversed.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is false.

briefdescription.para: Determines whether the letters of the text are rotated.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is false.

briefdescription.para: Determines whether all letters will be the same height regardless of initial case.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is false.

briefdescription.para: Defines whether a shadow is applied to the text on a text path.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is false.

briefdescription.para: Defines the size of the font in points.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is 36.

briefdescription.para: True if the font is formatted as small capital letters.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is false.

briefdescription.para: Defines the amount of spacing for text. 1 means 100%.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is 1.

briefdescription.para: True if the font is formatted as strikethrough text.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is false.

briefdescription.para: Defines the text of the text path.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is an empty string.

briefdescription.para: Defines the alignment of text.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is Center.

briefdescription.para: Determines whether extra space is removed above and below the text.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is false.

briefdescription.para: True if the font is underlined.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is false.

briefdescription.para: Determines whether a straight textpath will be used instead of the shape path.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is false.
If true, the text runs along a path from left to right along the x value of the lower boundary of the shape.
